name: Nuitka Compiler (.py to .pyd)
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Compiles a Python (.py) file into a compiled module (.pyd) using Nuitka for speed and source code protection.

properties.label: Source .py File (from Variable)
properties.description: The payload variable path containing the full path to the Python file to be compiled.

properties.label: Output Directory
properties.description: Folder to save the compiled .pyd file. If empty, it saves next to the source file.

properties.label: Delete Original .py File After Compilation
properties.description: If checked, the source .py file will be deleted after a successful compilation.

output_schema.name: data.compiled_path
output_schema.description: The full local path to the newly compiled .pyd file.
